des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your igoto smart products. After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps:
1. Download our “igoto smart” app in app market then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in “igoto smart” app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable “igoto smart” skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say “Search complete”;
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on the plug.
Alexa, turn off the plug.
Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.
Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.
Alexa, set the bedroom light to green.
